review: I'm hoping that this item improves and meets its full potential. At the moment it doesn't support as many applications as it could. For instance, Amazon Instant does NOT work because it uses Microsoft Silverlight, which for one reason or another doesn't stream to the television. Unfortunately I didn't find this out until right before I tried to start a movie.Netflix works pretty well. Streaming from a browser tab can be laggy. There's a delay between what happens on the computer and on the TV. Also, it's nice that you can "cast" a tab, and then use other tabs on your computer, but you can't make the cast tab full-screen if you want to switch to other tabs. So if you want to multitask (or say allow someone to watch a movie while you use your computer) then they would be forced to watch it in its embedded state (not full-screen).Like I said - I think this product has enormous potential. I'm sure there are a lot of ropes and hoops they have to jump through so they don't encroach on property rights and stuff like that. Hopefully it continues to improve. It would be a great value for the price.
author: Pat Mulligan
